description: Lists all applications associated with the instance of IAM Identity Center. When listing applications for an organization instance in the management account, member accounts must use the applicationAccount parameter to filter the list to only applications created from that account. When listing applications for an account instance in the same member account, a filter is not required.

parameters.name: InstanceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the IAM Identity Center application under which the operation will run. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) and Amazon Web Services Service Namespaces in the Amazon Web Services General Reference.

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: Filters response results. ApplicationAccount (string) --- An Amazon Web Services account ID number that filters the results in the response. ApplicationProvider (string) --- The ARN of an application provider that can filter the results in the response.

nested_params.name: ApplicationAccount
nested_params.description: An Amazon Web Services account ID number that filters the results in the response.

nested_params.name: ApplicationProvider
nested_params.description: The ARN of an application provider that can filter the results in the response.

nested_items.name: Applications
nested_items.description: Retrieves all applications associated with the instance.

nested_items.name: ApplicationProviderArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the application provider for this application.

nested_items.name: ApplicationAccount
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID number of the application.

nested_items.name: InstanceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the instance of IAM Identity Center that is configured with this application.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the application in this instance of IAM Identity Center.

nested_items.name: PortalOptions
nested_items.description: A structure that describes the options for the access portal associated with this application.

nested_items.name: SignInOptions
nested_items.description: A structure that describes the sign-in options for the access portal.

nested_items.name: Origin
nested_items.description: This determines how IAM Identity Center navigates the user to the target application. It can be one of the following values:
APPLICATION: IAM Identity Center redirects the customer to the configured ApplicationUrl.
IDENTITY_CENTER: IAM Identity Center uses SAML identity-provider initiated authentication to sign the customer directly into a SAML-based application.

nested_items.name: ApplicationUrl
nested_items.description: The URL that accepts authentication requests for an application. This is a required parameter if the Origin parameter is APPLICATION.

nested_items.name: Visibility
nested_items.description: Indicates whether this application is visible in the access portal.

nested_items.name: CreatedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when the application was originally created.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If present, this value indicates that more output is available than is included in the current response. Use this value in the NextToken request parameter in a subsequent call to the operation to get the next part of the output. You should repeat this until the NextToken response element comes back as null. This indicates that this is the last page of results.
